Text: Good luck!
Well, I was, but you \n see - the editor, he \n decided-
Decided what?
He decided not to run \n the article... You could \n say he squashed it.

How could he!? 
 Can't you do 
 anything to get it 
 in print?

Turns out my mighty pen 
 wasn't mighty enough to 
 stand up to the power of 
 money.
You need more than \n words to get the truth \n out to the world.

But justice always 
 finds a way! I'll do

 to see it does!

Reporter: \n That boat...!
This has to be the \n place... My information \n better pay off.
What's this guy up to? \n He's acting a little \n suspicious.
Hey, you! What are \n you doing!?
Ah! Wh-Who are you?
You're acting real \n fishy, talking to \n yourself and all.
Fishy? Me? No, no, \n they're the fishy ones.
I'm a reporter trying to \n get a scoop on a deal \n that's going down.

One of the Garrison 
 officers is in bed with 
 one of the rich citizens 
 of Jirga Para Lhao.
Ooh, bad guys! \n Need some help takin' em \n down? I'm your girl!
It's good to meet \n someone whose heart \n burns for justice!
Wai-? \n What's that...?
I need to stay out of sight...

That's one of the 
 Garrison's airboats. 
 That must be the 
 officer you're after.
We need to get \n to the boat!
Oh-uh... Look at all \n those guns... They're \n so... real.

My only weapon is the 
 pen I use to write my 
 articles. I'm very 
 anti-violence.
Huh? Are you just gonna \n let them get away with \n this then?

You must get us justice! 
 If you get a good 
 picture, I'll make sure 
 it gets in the papers.
We need a shot of \n the deal as it's \n taking place.

Make sure to get both 
 of their faces in the 
 shot the moment they 
 make the handoff.
If they spot you, \n they'll call off the \n deal, so be careful.

May we bring the city 
 the justice it needs. 
 My mighty pen is itching 
 to tell this story!
I'm all for justice, but \n why do I get stuck with \n the dangerous part?
Sometimes we must face \n down danger to reveal \n the truth to the world.

And I'm guessing that 
 "we" is "me." Well, I 
 guess there's not much 
 choice.
Why do I always \n get dragged into \n these things?
Here he comes! You can just tell he's up to no good...
Time for a picture!
I need to get back to the island.

I haven't looked that way yet.
I think I can get down there.
I should be able to reach the deal site from here.
I can take a picture from there.

Heard they'll \n be rollin' in \n around noon.

 people don't just

 like the other guy

Yeah, I wanted \n to make sure it \n was okay.

 What about the

Meow!
H-Hey, you!
Shoot, they spotted me!
Aaah I missed the shot!
I got the shot! Now to \n get this picture to that \n journalist.
This is perfect! How did \n you get so close?
Once people see this, \n they won't stand by and \n let this go on.

With these pictures and 
 my pen, the hammer is 
 about to come down on 
 wrongdoing!

 is gonna make me!

 justice-seeker.

I have to get there before the deal goes down.
